resources.string: GPS must be turned on for this application to function. Turn on now?
This app requires precise location permissions
Minimum speed must be at least 1 km/h
Max speed must be at least 1 km/h greater than min speed
Please turn on GPS before starting
Please allow the app to access your precise location
It is best to use this app on the same device that is running STEPN so that both apps are using the same location data.
STEPN adds a 30-second buffer to every activity. This app\'s timer accounts for this extra time, but it may not match STEPN\'s timer exactly.

Mystery box chances should be acceptably accurate for levels 1–6, but please do not rely too much on these estimates because they are not precise. Estimates for levels 7–10 will be less accurate; they are difficult to predict due to the lack of available data.
HP is still new and may change. The HP estimate will improve as we get more data from the community.
Please contact me if you find any errors or have any suggestions to improve the app:
If you enjoy the app, please consider supporting!

Use the arrows to select a shoe. You can use the default shoes or you can select \"Custom\" to input custom speeds. The app will warn you if your current speed falls outside of the speed range that you choose.
Enter the amount of energy you wish to spend. The amount of time required to spend the energy will be displayed below.

Select whether or not the ten-second countdown timer is enabled. If enabled, this timer gives your GPS time to sync and gives you time to switch to the STEPN app to start your activity. If disabled, the app will start the activity timer immediately.

Select type of speed alerts: audible, vibration, neither, or both. If vibration alerts are enabled, your device will vibrate if you fall outside of your speed range. Vibrations will also occur at one minute and thirty seconds, if these alerts are enabled.

Select whether or not voice alerts are enabled. The \"Speed\" and \"Time\" alerts will sound every five minutes, updating you with the amount of time remaining and information about your speed. The \"1 min / 30 sec\" alert gives a warning when you have one minute remaining and another warning at thirty seconds.
Press the start button to start your activity. Happy earning!
Please view these brief instructions before getting started.
Energy must be a multiple of 0.2
This app requires location permissions to run properly. Please select \"Precise\" in order to receive accurate speed alerts.
The goal of this app is to make walking and running while using STEPN more enjoyable. Audible alerts allow you to focus on your activity rather than constantly checking your phone.
There is now an option for vibrating speed alerts
If enabled, your device will vibrate if you fall outside of your speed range
You can choose between audible alerts, vibrating alerts, both, or neither
Vibrations will also occur at one minute and thirty seconds, if these alerts are enabled
If you have been enjoying the app, please consider leaving a review on the Play Store!
Based on unofficial STEPN community data.\nActual results may vary.
Are you sure you want to reset all values?
